claims.claim: AI technologies significantly streamlined bureaucratic tasks leading to increased operational efficiency
claims.quote: AI technologies have significantly streamlined bureaucratic tasks within AXA, leading to increased operational efficiency.

claims.claim: Over 35,000 employees engaged with AI-powered Skills Platform leading to increased job satisfaction and reduced staff attrition
claims.quote: Over 35,000 employees at AXA Switzerland engaged with the AI-powered Skills Platform, leading to increased job satisfaction and reduced staff attrition.

claims.claim: Predictive accuracy of traffic accidents improved from 40% to 78%, significantly optimizing policy pricing
claims.quote: In Japan, the predictive accuracy of traffic accidents rose from 40% to 78%, significantly optimizing policy pricing.

claims.claim: AI implementations freed up employees from mundane tasks to focus on customer engagement and growth activities
claims.quote: Across the board, these implementations have freed up employees from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus more on customer engagement and growth-oriented activities.

claims.claim: Server instance creation time reduced from many months to one hour
claims.quote: Now, instead of taking many months, creating a new server instance takes an hour.

claims.claim: Migration freed developers from maintenance duties allowing them to innovate and adopt CI/CD principles
claims.quote: The migration has also freed developers of maintenance duties, allowing them to innovate and adopt continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) principles.

claims.claim: Database migration completed over a weekend with no business disruption
claims.quote: So we were able to migrate a database from on premises to the cloud over a weekend with no disruption to business.

claims.claim: Centralization of project data facilitated better coordination and oversight
claims.quote: Unified project environment: Centralization of project data facilitated better coordination and oversight.

claims.claim: Improved visibility into resource capacity enabled more effective allocation
claims.quote: Enhanced resource planning: Improved visibility into resource capacity enabled more effective allocation.

claims.claim: Ability to generate transparent reports enhanced decision-making processes
claims.quote: Streamlined reporting: Ability to generate transparent reports enhanced decision-making processes.
